ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon steak sauce (e.g. A-1), or to taste

cookingTips: Mix ingredients gently with your hands until just combined to avoid dense, tough patties
Form four equal patties and make a slight depression in the center to prevent them from puffing up while cooking
Don't press down on the burgers while cooking as this squeezes out juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Simple is best for a classic burger. Would you like guidance on achieving the perfect doneness level?
